name: MBM International
tagline: Make Your Ideas Work // We have a track record of projects with top level international corporations and startups. With our resources we support partners and customers with software development, consulting and research services around the world. We are dedicated to support you to make your ideas work. //
body:
##Software Development
We are experts in developing solutions based on Open Source software and hardware. Our projects range from small to large scale. We manage projects with developers in our offices in Vietnam as well as with our network of developers in India, Latin America and around the world.

##Consulting
With constant tech developments new opportunities and challenges permanently arise. Facilitators become a necessity in established operations - to support positive adaption and implementations of new processes. In a startup resources to set up business process require a strong focus on the core idea. MBM is a partner to support your growth. Our consultants achieve your goals.

##ICT Research
We conduct market research throughout Asia and the EMEA region and support you to develop and implement marketing strategies to grow your business.

***

##The Founders
**Mario Behling** is an entrepreneur who grew up in Berlin, Germany. He is a Linux expert and the founder of the light Ubuntu distribution, Lubuntu. Mario organized numerous enterprise matchmaking events like FOSS Bridge in Asia, deployed WiFi mesh networks in Afghanistan, started the FOSSASIA community, supports hardware projects like Crypto Stick, and engages with the Fashion and Tech community in Europe. Apart from that he also build a hotel, set up a tour company in Vietnam and made a film in the Ukraine.

**Hong Phuc Dang** lived several years in the US and Singapore after her childhood in Vietnam. She is widely recognized as an Open Source community and graphics software expert. She has worked on research projects for top International data research companies. Hong Phuc has spoken at numerous International conferences and organized GNOME.Asia and FOSSASIA events.

***

## The Company
MBM International was founded in 2009 by Mario Behling (Germany) and DANG Hong Phuc (Vietnam/Singapore). Since its inception the goal of the company is to lead international corporations and technology startups towards producing higher revenue generating products.

The company builds its operations on the basis of its internationally experienced staff and a proven track record of its founders. We enable our clients to provide better services and products.

* Leading business services with consultants in Vietnam, China, Cambodia, Myanmar, and Singapore and Internationally experienced team working efficiently across languages and cultural barriers
* Over 10 years of experience in the regions market of the company's top management from Germany, Japan and internationally experienced Vietnam staff.
* Direct level contacts to top regional and national decision makers.
* Management best practices with certified SCRUM Masters and usage of distributed technologies, git, and tracking systems
* Providing services in cooperation with global and local partners including Google, lubuntu, IBM, SUN Microsystems, Quang Trung Software City, IOIT (Viện Công nghệ thông tin), GIZ (German Development Cooperation), INRIA France, OW2 Consortium and the LXDE Foundation.

#### Track Record
* Successfully completed projects for world leading companies such as Swiss Post Solutions, Dutch Post, Google, Canonical, Sun Microsystems
* Large developer community through our FOSSASIA network
* Open hardware projects with Crypto Stick
* Customized OpenWrt distribution
* Mobile Apps on markets and responsive web technologies
* Strong research record and cooperations with development companies including GIZ (German Development cooperation), Australian Aid, and Development Aid Sweden, Open Institute Cambodia, Development Innovations
* Event organization of top Asian developer conferences in Vietnam, Cambodia, and Singapore including GNOME.Asia, FOSSASIA, and Barcamps


***

##Careers
Do you want to work in an international environment? Are you able to actively collaborate with people and organizations in your local environment and across the globe? Do you believe in sharing knowledge with your partners to achieve the highest outcome? Please send us your CV at careers@mbm.vn.

***

##Contact
**MBM International Ltd.** Cong Ty TNHH Thương Mai Dich Vụ Truyen Thong Mat Biec  |  93 Mau Than, p. Xuan Khanh, q. Ninh Kieu, TP. Can Tho  |  Phone: +84 710 3 834 283  |  Fax: +49 3 21 21 21 89 71  |  Email: info@mbm.vn
